Affinity.card_desc: [Elemental Shift] Reduce the Cooldown of Elemental Shift by {scale=1|1}s.

Arcane Flame.card_desc: [Inferno Cannon] Increase the Mana generation of Inferno Cannon by {scale=15|15}%.

Arcane Ice.card_desc: [Frost Bomb] Increase the Mana generation of Frost Bomb by {scale=15|15}%.

Cooling Runes.card_desc: [Frost Bolt] Dealing damage with Frost Bolt reduces the Cooldown of Inferno Cannon by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Discipline.card_desc: [Elemental Shift] Elemental Shift reduces the Cooldown of Frostfire Glide by {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Draconic Will.card_desc: [Elemental Shift] Elemental Shift reduces the Cooldown of Frost Bomb and Inferno Cannon by {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Elemental Barrier.card_desc: [Elemental Shift] Heal for {scale=50|50} after using Elemental Shift.

Elemental Grace.card_desc: [Armor] Gain a {scale=100|100}-health Shield for 3s after dropping to or below 50% Health.

Heat Sink.card_desc: [Pyreball] Dealing damage with Pyre Ball reduces the Cooldown of Frost Bomb by {scale=0.8|0.8}s.

Ice in her Veins.card_desc: [Frostfire Glide] Heal for {scale=50|50} every 1s while using FrostFire Glide.

Mana Rift.card_desc: [Mana Rift] Remaining still for 1s creates a Mana Rift around you that generates Mana every 1s. Leaving the Mana Rift destroys it.

Mystic Fire.card_desc: [Frostfire Glide] Regenerate {scale=5|5}% Mana every 1s while using FrostFire Glide.

Permafrost.card_desc: [Frost Bomb] Increase the Projectile Speed of Frost Bomb by {scale=6|6}%.

Pilgrimage.card_desc: [Frostfire Glide] Increase the duration of FrostFire Glide by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Pyromania.card_desc: [Pyromania] Successfully landing two Pyre Balls will cause the next Pyre Ball thrown after the second hit to explode in a 30-unit-radius area.

Splitting Ice.card_desc: [Splitting Ice] Frost Bolt Chains to a nearby enemy within 30 units, dealing 350 damage.

Swift Sear.card_desc: [Inferno Cannon] Increase your Movement Speed while casting Inferno Cannon by {scale=20|20}%.

Affinit\u00e4t.card_desc: [Elementarwechsel] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Elementarwechsel um {scale=1|1}s.

Arkane Flamme.card_desc: [Infernokanone] Erhöht die Manaerzeugung durch Infernokanone um {scale=15|15}%.

Arkanes Eis.card_desc: [Frostbombe] Erhöht die Manaerzeugung durch Frostbombe um {scale=15|15}%.

Dauerfrost.card_desc: [Frostbombe] Erhöht die Projektilgeschwindigkeit der Frostbombe um {scale=6|6}%.

Disziplin.card_desc: [Elementarwechsel] Elementarwechsel reduziert die Abklingzeit von Frostfeuergleiten um {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Drakonischer Wille.card_desc: [Elementarwechsel] Elementarwechsel reduziert die Abklingzeit von Frostbombe und Infernokanone um {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Eis in den Adern.card_desc: [Frostfeuergleiten] Während Frostfeuergleiten wirst du pro Sekunde {scale=50|50} LP geheilt.

Eissplitter.card_desc: [Eissplitter] Frostblitz springt zu einem weiteren Gegner im Umkreis von 30 Einheiten und fügt diesem 350 Schaden zu.

Elementarbarriere.card_desc: [Elementarwechsel] Nach Verwendung von Elementarwechsel wirst du {scale=50|50} LP geheilt.

Elementare Gnade.card_desc: [Rüstung] Fällst du auf oder unter 50% Gesundheit, erhältst du 3s lang einen Schild mit {scale=100|100} LP.

Feuriges Momentum.card_desc: [Frostfeuergleiten] Erhöht das Tempo von Frostfeuergleiten um {scale=5|5}%.

K\u00fchlende Runen.card_desc: [Frostblitz] Treffer mit Frostblitz reduzieren die Abklingzeit von Infernokanone um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

K\u00fchlk\u00f6rper.card_desc: [Flammenkugel] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Frostbombe um {scale=0.8|0.8}s, wenn du mit Flammenkugel Schaden verursachst.

Manakluft.card_desc: [Manakluft] Stehst du 1s lang still, wird um dich herum eine Manakluft erzeugt, die jede Sekunde Mana erzeugt. Verlässt du die Manakluft, wird sie zerstört.

Mystisches Feuer.card_desc: [Frostfeuergleiten] Während Frostfeuergleiten wird pro Sekunde {scale=5|5}% Mana erzeugt.

Pilgerschaft.card_desc: [Frostfeuergleiten] Erhöht die Dauer von Frostfeuergleiten um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Pyromanie.card_desc: [Pyromanie] Nach zwei Treffern mit Flammenkugel explodiert die nächste Flammenkugel in einem Gebiet mit 30-Einheiten-Radius.

Schnell versengen.card_desc: [Infernokanone] Erhöht dein Lauftempo während der Aufladung von Infernokanone um {scale=20|20}%.

Uralte Verpflichtung.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=50|50} LP.

Affinit\u00e9.card_desc: [Transition élémentaire] Transition élémentaire se recharge {scale=1|1}s plus vite.

Barri\u00e8re \u00e9l\u00e9mentaire.card_desc: [Transition élémentaire] Vous regagnez {scale=50|50} PV à l'activation de Transition élémentaire.

Discipline.card_desc: [Transition élémentaire] Le temps de recharge d'Envol de feu glacé diminue de {scale=0.6|0.6}s à l'activation de Transition élémentaire.

\u00c9lan embras\u00e9.card_desc: [Envol de feu glacé] Votre vitesse augmente de {scale=5|5}% pendant Envol de feu glacé.

Faille de mana.card_desc: [Faille de mana] Après 1s d'immobilité, une Faille de mana vous entoure et vous rend du mana chaque seconde. Elle disparaît quand vous en sortez.

Feu mystique.card_desc: [Envol de feu glacé] Vous regagnez {scale=5|5}% de mana par seconde pendant Envol de feu glacé.

Flamme arcanique.card_desc: [Canon infernal] Canon infernal rend {scale=15|15}% de mana en plus.

Flamme \u00e9vanescente.card_desc: [Canon infernal] Pendant Canon infernal, votre vitesse augmente de {scale=20|20}%.

Glace arcanique.card_desc: [Bombe de glace] Bombe de glace rend {scale=15|15}% de mana en plus.

Gr\u00e2ce \u00e9l\u00e9mentaire.card_desc: [Armure] Passer en dessous de 50% de PV donne un bouclier de {scale=100|100} PV pendant 3s.

Morsure du froid.card_desc: [Morsure du froid] Trait glacial rebondit sur un ennemi à 30 unités de la cible et lui inflige 350 dégâts.

P\u00e8lerinage.card_desc: [Envol de feu glacé] Envol de feu glacé dure {scale=0.5|0.5}s de plus.

Perg\u00e9lisol.card_desc: [Bombe de glace] La vitesse du projectile de Bombe de glace augmente de {scale=6|6}%.

Pyromanie.card_desc: [Pyromanie] Quand 2 Orbes enflammés touchent une cible, le prochain explose en infligeant des dégâts dans un rayon de 30 unités.

Runes glaciales.card_desc: [Trait glacial] Le temps de recharge de Canon infernal diminue de {scale=0.5|0.5}s si Trait glacial inflige des dégâts.

Sang froid.card_desc: [Envol de feu glacé] Vous récupérez {scale=50|50} PV/s pendant Envol de feu glacé.

Transfert thermique.card_desc: [Orbe enflammé] Si Orbe enflammé inflige des dégâts, le temps de recharge de Bombe de glace diminue de {scale=0.8|0.8}s.

Volont\u00e9 du dragon.card_desc: [Transition élémentaire] Transition élémentaire réduit le temps de recharge de Bombe de glace et Canon infernal de {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Affinity.card_desc: [Elemental Shift] Reduce the Cooldown of Elemental Shift by {scale=1|1}s.

Ancient Duty.card_desc: [Armor] Increase your base maximum Health by {scale=50|50}.

Arcane Flame.card_desc: [Inferno Cannon] Increase Inferno Cannon's Mana contribution by {scale=15|15}%

Arcane Ice.card_desc: [Frost Bomb] Increase Frost Bomb's Mana contribution by {scale=15|15}%.

Cooling Runes.card_desc: [Pyreball] Dealing damage with Pyreball reduces the Cooldown of Frost Bomb by {0.5|0.5}s.

Discipline.card_desc: [Elemental Shift] Elemental Shift reduces the Cooldown of Frostfire Glide by {scale=1|1}s.

Draconic Will.card_desc: [Elemental Shift] Elemental Shift reduces the Cooldown of Frost Bomb and Inferno Cannon by {scale=1|1}s

Elemental Barrier.card_desc: [Elemental Shift] Using Elemental Shift heals you for {scale=100|100} Health.

Elements Grace.card_desc: [Armor] Dropping to or below 50% HP grants a {scale=100|100}hp Shield for 3s.

Heat Sink.card_desc: [Pyreball] Dealing damage with Pyreball reduces the Cooldown of Frost Bomb by {0.5|0.5}s.

Ice in her Veins.card_desc: [Frostfire Glide] While in Frostfire Glide heal for {scale=50|50} health every second.

Mana Rift.card_desc: [Mana Rift] After standing still for 1s create a Mana Rift around you that generates Mana. Leaving the Mana Rift destroys it.

Mystic Fire.card_desc: [Frostfire Glide] Generate {scale=4|4}% Mana every second while in Frostfire Glide.

Permafrost.card_desc: [Frost Bomb] Increase the root duration of Frost Bomb by {scale=0.2|0.2}s.

Pilgrimage.card_desc: [Frostfire Glide] Increase Frostfire Glide's duration by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Pyromania.card_desc: [Pyromania] Hitting twice with Pyre Ball will make your third Pyre Ball explode in an area.

Splitting Ice.card_desc: [Splitting Ice] Frost Bolt bounces to an additional enemy.

Swift Sear.card_desc: [Inferno Cannon] Increase your movement speed while casting inferno cannon by {scale=10|10}%.

Afinidad.card_desc: [Cambio elemental] Reduce la recarga de Cambio elemental en {scale=1|1}s.

Barrera elemental.card_desc: [Cambio elemental] Te curas {scale=50|50} PS tras usar Cambio elemental.

Deber antiguo.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu salud máxima aumenta en {scale=50|50} PS.

Disciplina.card_desc: [Cambio elemental] Cambio elemental reduce la recarga de Desliz de fuego y escarcha en {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Fisura de man\u00e1.card_desc: [Fisura de maná] Si permaneces inmóvil durante 1s, creas una Fisura de maná a tu alrededor que genera maná cada 1s. La Fisura de maná se destruirá si sales de ella.

Fuego m\u00edstico.card_desc: [Desliz de fuego y escarcha] Recuperas un {scale=5|5}% de maná cada 1s mientras dure Desliz de fuego y escarcha.

Gracia elemental.card_desc: [Armadura] Consigues un escudo con {scale=100|100} PS durante 3s cuando tu salud baja al 50% o menos.

Hielo arcano.card_desc: [Bomba helada] El maná que recuperas con Bomba helada aumenta un {scale=15|15}%.

Hielo en sus venas.card_desc: [Desliz de fuego y escarcha] Te curas {scale=50|50} PS cada 1s que Desliz de fuego y escarcha esté activa.

Impulso pir\u00e9tico.card_desc: [Desliz de fuego y escarcha] Desliz de fuego y escarcha viaja un {scale=5|5}% más rápido.

Llama arcana.card_desc: [Cañón infernal] El maná que recuperas con Cañón infernal aumenta un {scale=15|15}%.

Peregrinaci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Desliz de fuego y escarcha] La duración de Desliz de fuego y escarcha aumenta en {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Permahielo.card_desc: [Bomba helada] Aumenta la velocidad de proyectil de Bomba helada en {scale=6|6}%.

Piroman\u00eda.card_desc: [Piromanía] Si aciertas con dos Bolas de pira, la siguiente Bola de pira lanzada tras el segundo impacto explotará en un área de 30 unidades.

Quebrando hielo.card_desc: [Quebrando hielo] Disparo escarchado enlaza con un enemigo que esté a 30 unidades y le inflige 350 PS de daño.

Quemadura rauda.card_desc: [Cañón infernal] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=20|20}% al lanzar Cañón infernal.

Runas refrescantes.card_desc: [Disparo escarchado] Se reduce la recarga del Cañón infernal en {scale=0.5|0.5}s al infligir daño a enemigos.

Transmisor de calor.card_desc: [Bola pirotécnica] Se reduce la recarga de Bomba helada en {scale=0.8|0.8}s al infligir daño con Bola pirotécnica.

Voluntad draconiana.card_desc: [Cambio elemental] Cambio elemental reduce la recarga de Bomba helada y Cañón infernal en {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Afinidade.card_desc: [Troca Elemental] Reduz o intervalo da Troca Elemental em {scale=1|1}s.

Barreira Elemental.card_desc: [Troca Elemental] Você se cura em {scale=50|50} de vida após usar a Troca Elemental.

Chama Arcana.card_desc: [Canhão Infernal] Aumenta em {scale=15|15}% a quantidade de mana gerada pelo Canhão Infernal.

Chamuscada de leve.card_desc: [Canhão Infernal] Aumenta sua velocidade de movimento enquanto usa o Canhão Infernal em {scale=20|20}%.

Dever Antigo.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta a sua vida máxima em {scale=50|50}.

Disciplina.card_desc: [Troca Elemental] Troca Elemental reduz o intervalo do Gelo Deslizante em {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Dissipador de Calor.card_desc: [Esfera Flamejante] Acertar o inimigo com a Esfera Flamejante reduz o intervalo da Bomba Congelante em {scale=0.8|0.8}s.

Fenda de Mana.card_desc: [Fenda de Mana] Ficar parada por 1s cria uma Fenda de Mana ao seu redor que gera mana a cada 1s. Sair da Fenda de Mana a destrói.

Fogo M\u00edstico.card_desc: [Gelo Deslizante] Regenera {scale=5|5}% de mana a cada 1s enquanto está usando o Gelo Deslizante.

Gelo Arcano.card_desc: [Bomba Congelante] Aumenta em {scale=15|15}% a quantidade de mana gerada pela Bomba Congelante.

Gelo nas Veias.card_desc: [Gelo Deslizante] Você se cura em {scale=50|50} de vida a cada 1s enquanto está usando o Gelo Deslizante.

Gelo Permanente.card_desc: [Bomba Congelante] Aumenta a velocidade do projétil da Bomba Congelante em {scale=6|6}%.

Gelo Rachado.card_desc: [Gelo Rachado] Raio Congelante ricocheteia em um inimigo próximo dentro de 30 unidades, causando 350 de dano..

Gra\u00e7a Elemental.card_desc: [Armadura] Ganha um escudo de {scale=100|100} de vida por 3s ao chegar a 50% ou menos da sua vida.

Momento Fren\u00e9tico.card_desc: [Gelo Deslizante] Você se move {scale=5|5}% mais rápido com o Gelo Deslizante.

Peregrina\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Gelo Deslizante] Aumenta a duração do Gelo Deslizante em {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Piromania.card_desc: [Piromania] Acertar duas vezes com a Esfera Flamejante fará com que a próxima Esfera Flamejante disparada após o segundo acerto exploda em uma área de 30 unidades de raio.

Runas Congelantes.card_desc: [Raio Congelante] Causar dano com o Raio Congelante reduz o intervalo do Canhão Infernal em {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Vontade Drac\u00f4nica.card_desc: [Troca Elemental] Troca Elemental reduz o intervalo da Bomba Congelante e do Canhão Infernal em {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

\u0412\u0435\u0447\u043d\u0430\u044f \u0.card_desc: [Ледяная бомба] Скорость Ледяной бомбы повышается на {scale=6|6}%.

\u0412\u043e\u043b\u044f \u0434\u0440\u0.card_desc: [Смена стихий] Смена стихий сокращает перезарядку Ледяной бомбы и Пламенной пушки на {scale=0.6|0.6} с.

\u0414\u0438\u0441\u0446\u0438\u043f\u04.card_desc: [Смена стихий] Смена стихий сокращает перезарядку Скольжения по льду на {scale=0.6|0.6} с.

\u0414\u0440\u0435\u0432\u043d\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Ваше максимальное здоровье повышается на {scale=50|50} ед.

\u0416\u0430\u0440\u043e\u043f\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Скольжение по льду] Скорость Скольжения по льду повышается на {scale=5|5}%.

\u0418\u0437\u044f\u0449\u0435\u0441\u04.card_desc: [Броня] При уровне здоровья 50% и ниже вы получаете щит прочностью {scale=100|100} ед. на 3 с.

\u041b\u0435\u0434\u044f\u043d\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Скольжение по льду] Используя Скольжение по льду, вы исцеляетесь на {scale=50|50} ед. в секунду.

\u041c\u0433\u043d\u043e\u0432\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Пламенная пушка] Скорость передвижения во время действия Пламенной пушки повышается на {scale=20|20}%.

\u041f\u0430\u043b\u043e\u043c\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Скольжение по льду] Длительность Скольжения по льду увеличивается на {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

\u041f\u0438\u0440\u043e\u043c\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Пиромания] После двух попаданий Пламенным шаром третий Пламенный шар, выпущенный после попадания второго, наносит урон в радиусе 30 ед.

\u0420\u0430\u0441\u043a\u043e\u043b \u0.card_desc: [Раскол маны] Простояв неподвижно в течение 1 с., вы создаете Раскол маны, который генерирует ману каждую секунду. Когда вы покинете его, он разрушится.

\u0420\u0430\u0441\u043a\u043e\u043b\u04.card_desc: [Расколотый лед] Ледяная молния отскакивает к другому врагу в радиусе 30 ед., нанося 350 ед. урона.

\u0420\u0443\u043d\u044b \u0445\u043e\u0.card_desc: [Ледяная молния] Нанесение урона Ледяной молнией сокращает перезарядку Пламенной пушки на {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

\u0421\u0442\u0438\u0445\u0438\u0439\u04.card_desc: [Смена стихий] Смена стихий исцеляет вас на {scale=50|50} ед.

\u0421\u0445\u043e\u0434\u0441\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Смена стихий] Перезарядка Смены стихий сокращается на {scale=1|1} с.

\u0422\u0430\u0438\u043d\u0441\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Пламенная пушка] Пламенная пушка генерирует на {scale=15|15}% больше маны.
[Ледяная бомба] Ледяная бомба генерирует на {scale=15|15}% больше маны.
[Скольжение по льду] Используя Скольжение по льду, вы генерируете {scale=5|5}% маны в секунду.

\u0422\u0435\u043f\u043b\u043e\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Пламенный шар] Нанесение урона Пламенным шаром сокращает перезарядку Ледяной бомбы на {scale=0.8|0.8} с.

Bariera \u017cywio\u0142\u00f3w.card_desc: [Przywołanie żywiołów] Przywraca ci {scale=50|50} PZ po użyciu Przywołania żywiołów.

Dyscyplina.card_desc: [Przywołanie żywiołów] Przywołanie żywiołów skraca czas odnowienia Ślizgu zimnognia o {scale=0.6|0.6} s.

\u0141ami\u0105c l\u00f3d.card_desc: [Łamiąc lód] Mroźny bełt odbija się do pobliskiego wroga w promieniu 30 jedn., zadając 350 obrażeń.

\u0141aska \u017cywio\u0142\u00f3w.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zapewnia tarczę o {scale=100|100} pkt. odporności na 3 s po tym, jak twoje zdrowie spadnie poniżej 50%.

L\u00f3d w \u017cy\u0142ach.card_desc: [Ślizg zimnognia] Przywraca ci {scale=50|50} PZ co 1 s podczas korzystania ze Ślizgu zimnognia.

Magiczny l\u00f3d.card_desc: [Mroźna bomba] Zwiększa wytwarzanie many przez Mroźną bombę o {scale=15|15}%.

Magiczny p\u0142omie\u0144.card_desc: [Piekielne działo] Zwiększa wytwarzanie many przez Piekielne działo o {scale=15|15}%.

Mistyczny ogie\u0144.card_desc: [Ślizg zimnognia] Przywraca {scale=5|5}% many co 1 s podczas korzystania ze Ślizgu żywiołów.

Ognisty podmuch.card_desc: [Ślizg zimnognia] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu Ślizgu zimnognia o {scale=5|5}%.

Oparzenie b\u0142yskowe.card_desc: [Piekielne działo] Zwiększa twoją szybkość ruchu podczas aktywacji Piekielnego działa o {scale=20|20}%.

Pielgrzymka.card_desc: [Ślizg zimnognia] Wydłuża czas trwania Ślizgu zimnognia o {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

Piromania.card_desc: [Piromania] Udane wylądowanie dwóch Kul płomienia spowoduje, że następna Kula płomieni rzucona po drugim trafieniu, wybuchnie, rażąc obszar o promieniu 30 jedn.

Radiator.card_desc: [Kula płomieni] Zadanie obrażeń Kulą płomieni skraca czas odnowienia Mroźnej bomby o {scale=0.8|0.8} s.

Runy ch\u0142odzenia.card_desc: [Mroźny bełt] Zadawanie obrażeń Mroźnym bełtem skraca czas odnowienia Piekielnego działa o {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

Staro\u017cytny obowi\u0105zek.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa twoje maks. zdrowie o {scale=50|50} PZ.

Szczelina many.card_desc: [Szczelina many] 1 s pozostawania w bezruchu tworzy wokół ciebie Szczelinę many, która wytwarza manę co 1 s. Wyjście ze Szczeliny many niszczy ją.

Wieczna zmarzlina.card_desc: [Mroźna bomba] Zwiększa szybkość pocisku Mroźnej bomby o {scale=6|6}%.

Wi\u0119\u017a.card_desc: [Przywołanie żywiołów] Skraca czas odnowienia Przywołania żywiołów o {scale=1|1} s.

Wola smoka.card_desc: [Przywołanie żywiołów] Przywołanie żywiołów skraca czas odnowienia Mroźnej bomby i Piekielnego działa o {scale=0.6|0.6} s.

Alev Delisi.card_desc: [Alev Delisi] Başarıyla iki Ateş Topu attıktan sonra sonraki Ateş Topu 30 birimlik bir alanda patlar.

Ate\u015fli \u0130vme.card_desc: [Buz Sörfü] Buz Sörfü %{scale=5|5} daha hızlı ilerler.

Cazibe.card_desc: [Elementsel Değişim] Elementsel Değişim'in Bekleme Süresini {scale=1|1} sn azalt.

\u00c7evik Da\u011flama.card_desc: [Cehennem Topu] Cehennem Topu'nu kullanırken Hareket Hızını %{scale=20|20} artır.
